attributes.action: I want Newham council to rehouse everyone currently living at brimstone house.
attributes.background: Living conditions in brimstone is dehumanizing and the rent paid for this horrible property amounts to nothing but day light robbery by Newham council through Tando/Omega lettings

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Newham Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
